entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Campbellton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets or snow beginning overnight. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or snow changing to freezing rain in the morning then to rain showers near noon. Ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Sunday 15 January 2023
